name: PATIENT_TYPE
description: This table contains one record for each patient type for each patient.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient. This value is encrypted if encryption is enabled.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: A patient can be defined with one or many types.  This is the line number corresponding to the type for each patient.

columns.name: PATIENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value for each patient type entered for the patient (i.e. VIP, Study, etc.)
